infinitewater.ponder.infinite_water.head: Infinite Water Block
infinitewater.ponder.infinite_water.text: The Infinite Water Block can provide an unlimited supply of water.
Stress can be input from either the top or the bottom.
The required stress must be reached to activate the block.
If the stress is insufficient, no water will be supplied.
Once the stress threshold is met, the block will provide infinite water.
Water can be extracted from all four sides.
Connect pipes to any side to extract water.
Use a Mechanical Pump to extract the water.
